article: I've been married for seven years to an extraordinary woman,actress Catherine Zeta-Jones.We have two children,a daughter,4,and a son,7.My life is _ around my family's schedule.Our daughter just _ kindergarten and our son began the second _ last week.They are at a precious age,and I don't want to miss a minute of it. _ all parents,I labor to keep them on schedule,and try to teach them _ to think positively and to work through daily life.I also try hard to be sure they have _ .I read with my kids every night.That has become a _ for me. We've moved to the island of Bermuda,where I spent a lot of time as a _ (my mother is in Bermudian and still has a large family there).I _ my schedule to my wife's,since she is in the prime of her _ .The school year tells us when we are going to travel.The kids know what Mommy does for a living, _ they have never seen Daddy's movies (they're too young),so Mommy makes _ and Daddy makes pancakes! I don't really _ ,but I am the takeout and home-delivery expert.I enjoy it.It's all given me great _ .Don't get me wrong.I still go to work,but now only on projects I really care about.I have a new movie coming out calledKing of California.We _ it in only 31 days,not like some of the 90-day shooting schedules of the _ . There is so much to learn in _ a family.Basically,you want to try to leave this earth having given more to it than having taken _ .That makes you a good citizen of the planet.If I can _ this on from generation to generation,that's as close to immortality as I can hope to get.
